titles.title: In My Heart There Rings a Melody

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In my heart there rings a melody There rings a melody with heaven’s harmony In my heart there rings a melody There rings a melody of love{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I have a song that Jesus gave me It was sent from heav’n above There never was a sweeter melody ‘Tis a melody of love{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I love the Christ who died on Calv’ry For He washed my sins away He put within my heart a melody And I know it’s there to stay Chorus{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}‘Twill be my endless theme in glory With the angels I will sing ‘Twill be a song with glorious harmony When the courts of heaven ring Chorus{/lang-eng}
